content.webTitle: Readers' restaurants: Three more west London locals

fields.headline: Readers' restaurants
fields.bodyText: Austin's 93 Colne Road, Twickenham, 020-8898 8000 A gastropub serving some of the best Italian food in London - the pumpkin gnocchi with spinach is the best I've had outside of Italy. It's a proper local in a back street, so it probably won't be long before it moves. Doreen Kearn Twickenham La Bouchée 56 Old Brompton Road, SW7, 020-7589 1929 Intimate and excellent restaurant with great traditional food and drink, including good vegetarian options. The service is friendly and the atmosphere suits romantics, working meals and even solo dining. Mags L Halliday Exeter Brilliant 72-76 Western Road, Southall, 020-8574 1928 An intoxicating blend of great food, music, conversation and bright lights. From the array of interesting poppadom dips onwards, the Kenyan-influenced Punjabi food is superb. Brilliant by name ... Michael & Kate Crossland London W5 · Send a short review of a favourite restaurant to Weekend, 119 Farringdon Road, London EC1R 3ER (restaurants@theguardian.com). We're looking for the best gastropubs, curry houses, modern British cooking and hotel dining rooms. Please supply your full postal address.
